title: My pixel 3a won't turn on. No response to fastboot mode. Can't contact customer service.
content:
I was watching a video and suddenly the phone screen froze. Tried to restart, but it just went off. It looks like dead - no response to fastboot mode or charging.
Before it worked perfectly - no bugs, freezes.
I can't contact customer service. Tried to connect via google store, but it just redirects to google help site.
How can I contact service? Maybe there is an e-mail. I still have warranty.
